tuv.seg: MOJITO CUPCAKES
莫吉托纸杯蛋糕
yield: 12 cupcakes
产量：12个纸杯蛋糕
prep time: 30 minutes
准备时间：30分钟
cook time: 25 minutes
烘焙时间：25分钟
INGREDIENTS
做纸杯蛋糕需要：
1/2 cup buttermilk
半杯牛奶
1/2 cup mint leaves, bruised
半杯擦好的薄荷叶
1/2 cups all-purpose flour
一杯加半杯通用面粉
1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder
一茶匙加半茶匙发酵粉
1/4 teaspoon salt
四分之一茶匙盐
1/2 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature
半杯室温下的无盐黄油
1 cup granulated sugar
一杯砂糖
2 eggs, at room temperature
两个室温下的鸡蛋
Zest and juice of 1 1/2 limes
一杯加半杯酸橙皮加酸橙汁
2 tablespoons white rum
两汤匙白朗姆酒
1/4 teaspoon vanilla extract
四分之一茶匙香草精
To Brush the Cupcakes:
刷纸杯蛋糕需要：
2 tablespoons white rum
两汤匙白朗姆酒
2 sprigs fresh mint
两枝新鲜薄荷
For the Frosting:
糖霜需要：
1 1/2 cups unsalted butter, at room temperature
一杯加半杯室温下的无盐黄油
4 1/4 cups powdered sugar
四杯加四分之一杯糖粉
1 1/2 tablespoons lime juice
一汤匙加半汤匙柠檬汁
3 tablespoons white rum
三汤匙白朗姆酒
Combine the buttermilk and the cup mint leaves in a small saucepan over medium heat.
把酪乳和半杯薄荷叶混合倒进一个小锅里，中火加热。
Warm until just starting to steam (do not simmer), then remove from the heat and cover.
温热直到刚刚开始冒热气（不沸腾），然后关火揭盖。
Let steep for 15 to 30 minutes.
让它浸泡15至30分钟。
Once finished, strain the milk into a bowl using a fine mesh sieve.
一旦完成，用细网筛将牛奶滤入碗中。
The milk may appear curdled or clumpy, but don't worry, it will come back together.
牛奶可能会出现凝结或块状，但不要担心，它会重新溶在一起。
Press on any milk solids and mint leaves to extract all the liquid possible.
挤压乳固体和薄荷叶尽可能提取所有的液体。
Give the milk a quick stir to smooth it out and set aside.
把牛奶快速的搅拌使其变得平滑，放一边备用。
While the mint is steeping in the milk, preheat the oven to 325 degrees F. Line a standard muffin tin with paper liners; set aside.
当把薄荷浸泡在牛奶中时，预热烤箱到325华氏度。在标准松饼托上放上纸杯：放一边备用。
In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder and salt; set aside.
在一个中号碗里，将面粉，发酵粉和盐一起搅拌;放一边备用。
In an electric mixer on medium-high speed, beat the butter and sugar together until pale, light, and fluffy (about 5 minutes).
用电动搅拌器以中高速，将黄油和糖打至发白，轻柔，蓬松（约5分钟）。
Reduce the mixer speed to medium and add the eggs one at at time, mixing thoroughly after each addition.
降低搅拌器的速度至中速，逐个加入鸡蛋，每次加入后充分混合。
Scrape the sides of the bowl and add the lime zest, lime juice, vanilla extract and rum.
刮干净碗边，并加入酸橙皮，酸橙汁，香草精和朗姆酒。
Mix until combined.
搅拌至混合。
(The mixture may start to look curdled at this point, but don’t worry, it will all come back together, power on!)
（该混合物开始可能凝结于一点，但不要担心，它都会重合溶在一起，通电！）
Reduce the mixer speed low.
降低搅拌速度低。
Add the dry ingredients in three batches, alternating with the buttermilk in two batches.
分三批添加干的原料，乳酪分两批交替加入。
Mix only until just incorporated, using a rubber spatula to give it one last mix by hand.
调配至刚刚混合，用橡胶铲手动搅拌最后一下。
Divide the batter between the muffin cups.
将每两个松饼杯之间的糊状物划分开。
Bake for approximately 25 minutes or until just slightly golden and a skewer shows only moist crumbs attached, rotating the pan at the halfway point.
烘焙约25分钟或者烤到颜色略呈金黄色，用针刺穿只有一点潮湿碎屑，转动锅的中间位置。
While the cupcakes are baking, combine the rum and mint sprigs in a small saucepan and warm over medium heat until the rum is heated through (do not let it simmer).
当纸杯蛋糕在烘焙时，把朗姆酒和薄荷小枝混合倒入一个小锅里，并用中火加热，直到朗姆酒温热（不要让它沸腾）。
Remove the pan from the heat, cover, and let steep until ready to use.
下锅揭盖，浸泡放凉，直到准备使用。
Allow cupcakes to cool for 5 to 10 minutes and then remove to a cooling rack.
让蛋糕冷却5至10分钟，然后取出一个散热架。
Brush the tops of the cupcakes with the mint-infused rum.
在纸杯蛋糕的顶部刷上薄荷混合的朗姆酒。
Set the cupcakes aside to cool completely before frosting them.
将蛋糕放在一边，在刷上糖霜之前使它完全冷却。
To make the frosting, whip the butter on medium-high speed of an electric mixer using the whisk attachment for 5 minutes.
做糖霜，用中高转速的电动搅拌器拂附件搅拌5分钟黄油。
Reduce the speed to medium-low and gradually add the powdered sugar, mixing and scraping the sides of the bowl until all is incorporated.
降低到中低速，逐渐加入糖粉，混合和刮干净碗边，直至所有的东西都溶合。
Give it a mix on medium speed for about 30 seconds.
中速混合它约30秒。
Add the lime juice and rum and mix on medium-high speed until incorporated and fluffy.
加入酸橙汁和朗姆酒，以中高速拌匀直至充分混合，蓬松。
If the frosting appears a bit too soft, add some additional sugar, one spoonful at a time until desired consistency is reached.
如果糖霜表现得有点太软了，再加些糖，一次加一匙，直至调到所需稠度为止。
Frost cupcakes and garnish, if desired, with a lime wedge and sprig of fresh mint.
如果想要纸杯蛋糕上撒糖霜和装饰，可以用新鲜的薄荷枝和青柠角。
